0: I was told upon checking in that the gym was open only from 7 am to 7 pm

I travel endlessly and have stayed in many hotels and exercise in each gym with the same sports clothes so when the attendant told me I could not exercise because my shoes were not acceptable I was a taken aback and not a little annoyed
When I waited entered the gym at 7 am I was told it was open 24 hours though that was not what I was told
spa not treatments only sauna are not included for hotel guests
1: Lots of outdoor activities from sailing biking swimming paddle boarding
The spa facilities were great and I had a wonderful massage

The hotel sports a great rooftop pool a nice albeit small fitness room a very nice dry sauna wet sauna and shower facility along with massage services two restaurants two bars beachfront location and great service
The gym is amazing with views of the sea and great equipment
Great location with facilities gym swimming pool on the rooftop jacuzi as well
The hotel has a great gym and spa and the swimming pool is outstanding
this is a clean pretty five star hotel with rooftop pool and jacuzi kosher resturaunt lounge spa and amazing breakfast
Amazing service healthy and always fresh food big range of menu great spa zone good gym and of course not forgettable view from my room as well as from any restaurants in the hotel
